title: In game client freeze - completely have to restart computer to get out
body: I've been having this problem for monthsssss. I've virtually stopped playing because of it. Randomly in game my client will freeze. I can't alt+f4, I can't force a shut down in the task bar, often times i can't even alt+tab out. I have to completely restart my computer with a hard reset to get back into the game. My windows Game Bar is off. I've sent in multiple tickets and can't seem to get the issue resolved. Help please. QQ

replies.body: Hmmmm this sounds like your whole pc might be freezing up for some reason. I saw that you had a little bit of a back and forth with one of our tech agents, but it didn't go too far before the ticket was solved from there not being a response. Go ahead and reply to that ticket, or just send another over to those tech agents as this might need a little more in-depth troubleshooting than I can do from the boards.
